content:
The forces of southern Ukraine have destroyed two complexes of electronic warfare and twenty -five units of enemy equipment.

About thisIt is saidin the telegram-channel of defense forces of southern Ukraine.

During the day, the defenders eliminated 169 invaders in the south, destroyed 6 guns and 18 units of auto-bronze.

A tank and two electronic warfare systems were also destroyed.

"The defense forces continue to cause fire damage to the locations of the enemy, firing positions and rear," the message said.

As reported by the Armyinform, the loss of the Russian Federation for the past daymake up840 invaders, 10 tanks, 30 artistem and 35 BBM.
title: The Armed Forces soldiers in southern Ukraine destroyed two Russian rebves
description: This is stated in the telegram-channel of defense forces of southern Ukraine. During the day, defenders ...
author: Army Inform
